hadiths.text: Abu Hurairah and Zaid b. Khalid al-Juhani said:The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) was asked about a slave-woman who commits fornication, and she is not married: If she commits fornication, flog her: if she commits fornication again flog her; if only for a rope of hair (dafir). Ibn Shihab: I do not know whether he (the Prophet) said it is a third or a fourth time

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي الأَمَةِ تَزْنِي وَلَمْ تُحْصَنْ
chapter.eng-name: A slave girl commits zina and has not been married
